headline: PPL's Q1 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: PPL's first-quarter 2025 earnings and revenues increase year over year. Total operating expenses increase during the same period.

headline: PPL: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Allentown, Pennsylvania-based company said it had profit of 56 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and costs related to mergers and acquisitions, were 60 cents per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: PPL: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Allentown, Pennsylvania-based company said it had profit of 56 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs and costs related to mergers and acquisitions, were 60 cents per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

headline: PPL Corporation reports first-quarter 2025 earnings
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL) today announced first-quarter 2025 reported earnings (GAAP) of $414 million, or $0.56 per share, compared with first-quarter 2024 reported earnings of $307 million, or $0.42 per share.
